title: Definitive Gaming Next Meta Plays Recruiting
body:
Definitive Gaming is a social yet competitive gaming community which offers several games aswell as teams which play on casual or competitive level. Our League of Legends Team Nextmetaplays is in need of a jungler and a marksman right now. This is where you come in. If you are older then 16 ranked in between Plat 5 to Plat 1 and speak fluent english or german (roster consists of 5 germans right now ) we would be glad to try you out. You should be able to respect your teammates and accept criticism yet not be afraid to state your opinion about for example a missplay by you or others. If you want to give it a try you can add me ingame
Im looking forward to playing with some of you !{{item:1307}}
